title: Moses: The Sacred Stories in Judaism, Christianity, and Islam
description: The story of Moses has intrigued readers for millennia. This book presents the stories of Moses and shows how the Jewish, Christian, and Muslim traditions have interpreted these stories. The chapters focus on four key moments in the story of Moses: the birth of Moses, the killing of the Egyptian, the call of Moses, and Moses before the Pharaoh. Each chapter presents Scriptural accounts of the story and some passages from important and highly respected early sources.
author: Allen S. Davidson
